item.title: JAR--->ExE
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

[quote=“Goneby123, post:1, topic:116461”]How Do I Create My Client Into An ExE? and how i see the java codeing? plzz help and i need a good website that can host it[/quote]Java archives into JAR and C++ archives into EXE. JAR is the only one allowed in web pages. Java has more security too.

item.title: JAR--->ExE
item.dc:creator: @Speak Speak
item.description:
@Speak wrote:

n just go to file at the top left-hand corner, then go to save , and a screen should pop up, in the very first box at the bottom type in client.exe , in the next box click to arrows to the right, and select “all files” leave the third bow like i is and click save

and sorry i can’t help you for html

item.title: JAR--->ExE
item.dc:creator: @Speak Speak
item.description:
@Speak wrote:

to make it a .exe go to file>save as then type in client.exe in the first box and in the second box click the arrows and select “all files”
